attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
pumping 50 bn into the unsettled banking crisis could be detremental at this stage.could only lead us into a deeper recession with most our assests being swollowed by Amewrican banks.
Should we not wait if in doubt for things to settle.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
